pages.text: $(italic)Every now and then you are lucky enough to have an enemy leave behind a single rare item.$(br)The connection to luck of $(l:resources/clover)Clover$(/l) and $(l:general/pigment#light_blue)Light Blue Pigment$(/l) you can increase those chances dramatically.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Higher chance to get rare loot drops, like Iron Ingots from Zombies.$(br)May even increase your chances of getting the most valuable of drops?$(br2)Max Level: 3$(br)Applicable to melee weapons.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a common Book with Clovers' Favor by surrounding your Enchanter with Pigment and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Clovers' Favor from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.$(br)This price will quickly increase to more and more Pigment and Experience for each additional level.
